wiki.content: Matisyahu told Spinner UK: "It is an anthem of hope with a big beat, the kind of song that makes you bob your head and open your heart at the same time." (Source One Day Songfacts). Matisyahu & Akon User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Matisyahu told Spinner UK: "It is an anthem of hope with a big beat, the kind of song that makes you bob your head and open your heart at the same time." (Source One Day Songfacts). Matisyahu & Akon

track.name: One Day
comments: I also think about this song a smoothy song and religion cause do feeling in heart and keep going our mind in peace ever and always travelling to space. i´m so glad for this,
nice song，smoothy rhythm，simple lyrics, just like reaggae, his voice is like Bob Marley,but little bit more clean.
It's a shame the entire world can't live by these lyrics. Peace, love, unity.
One Deeeee, One Deeeee, One Deeeeeeeeeeeeeee
One day, one day, one day
all versions are very, very good... this makes Matisyahu a real good artist!
...that we don't wanna no more, there'll be no more wars, and our children will play... that line is still giving me chills.
the reggae version is so good
Heard this song on NBA2K10 and instantly loved it..
